Name: Heart amulet
Description: Heart amulets were placed over the real heart. The front of this example bears a cartouche with the prenomen of Ramesses II or that of Shoshenq III of the 22nd Dynasty. It is preceded by "Lord of the Two Lands". Shoshenq had a tomb at Tanis but his funerary equipment was no longer complete when it was found. The blue colour of the amulet was very popular with the kings of Tanis.
